data.title: adc telecommunications
data.meta_description:
Adc Telecommunications has 5,090 patents for the period 2009 - 2018.
There are 799 patent families with 1,768 granted patents and 3,322 applications patents.
The key filing countries are US: 2,472 | RoW: 1,004 | EP: 606 | WO: 486 | CN: 433 | KR: 70 | JP: 19.
